Posts.EditableText: I'm making games for my website and I wanted to embed a game I made into the page, I can't figure out how to convert it to HTTPS.
Posts.HTML: I'm making games for my website and I wanted to embed a game I made into the page, I can't figure out how to convert it to HTTPS.

Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

You can't convert it.  (Sorry to be the bearer of bad news.)

...but you can just publish the game on this site and link to the game on this site from your website.
Posts.HTML:
Hello.

You can't convert it. (Sorry to be the bearer of bad news.)

...but you can just publish the game on this site and link to the game on this site from your website.
